name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon 2: Summit Strike
name_original: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon 2: Summit Strike
description:
Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon 2: Summit Strike is an action game. It came out on 04-05-2003. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon 2: Summit Strike is available on Xbox.
